contents: My restaurant will thrive because of my experience. I know all the details, and understand the jobs and needs of all my workers. <u>I understand what customers want and how to make you feel welcome.</u> Remembering a face and greeting someone by name goes a lot farther than remembering the capital of South Dakota. It will be hard work, but I know I can do it.<u> I’ve had an education from experience, and that’s something you can’t put a price tag on.</u>
